result.notes: To include the full register of DSA staff and work contact details. The full physical assets lists. The contract will also be responsible for work men on site including third parties.

organization.name: driving-standards-agency
organization.title: Driving Standards Agency
organization.description:
The Driving Standards Agency (DSA) was replaced by Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) in April 2014.

DSA was an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Transport.

It existed from 1 April 1990 to 31 March 2014.

Find out more at https://www.gov.uk/dsa.
